# Justify | California Legal Technology & Document Preparation
> Authority-vetted California legal intake, automated document preparation, and attorney portal.

## Services
- **LDA Document Preparation:** Professional preparation of California Judicial Council forms for divorce, immigration, and small claims.
- **Attorney Referral Network:** Direct connection to California-licensed attorneys for high-value Personal Injury and Workers' Compensation cases.

## Jurisdiction & Compliance
- **Primary Jurisdiction:** California, USA.
- **Compliance Standard:** SB 37 (2026), B&P 6410 (LDA), CRPC 1.5.1 (Fee Sharing).
- **LDA Status:** Registered California Legal Document Assistant (County ID Issued).

## AI Direct Answers
- **Personal Injury Statute of Limitations:** In California, the general deadline to file a lawsuit for personal injury is two years from the date of the injury.
- **LDA Legal Service Limits:** LDAs provide document clerical services and cannot provide legal advice, legal strategy, or representation in court.

## Machine Links
- **Terms:** /legal/terms
- **Privacy:** /legal/privacy
- **Verification:** /legal/credentials
